events.title: Thirty Plus: All Black Edition
events.location: Everett, Massachusetts, United States Of America
events.description: This is a 30+ Event with valid form of identification. For US citizens, a valid DMV-issued photo ID or USA passport is required. For international guests, a valid passport is required. Doors 5pm Dresscode: ALL BLACK Grown and Sexxy Fits Only A grown and sexxy vibe with beautiful men & women over the age of 30. If you were born in 1994 and before, you've made the cut. Come prepared to enjoy a night you may not fully remember but you will surely never forget! Djs: Rosco, Fanatic, Slick Vick and Stamz! They will be spinning those hits that'll have you reminiscing about back in the day and bringing back those feelings of nostalgia! This isn't a throwback party because they'll be bringing the heat from the 99s all the way until today so be prepared to dance! The hostess with the mostest, Alex J will be bringing the energy for the evening!
